001package net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage;

020
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreExecution;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreTime;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.redis.TNEJedisManager;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.connect.SQLConnector;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.engine.StorageSettings;
028import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
029import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
030import redis.clients.jedis.JedisPool;
031
032import java.util.ArrayList;
033import java.util.Collection;
034import java.util.Optional;
035
036/**
037 * The manager, which manages everything related to storage. Manages: - Loading - Saving - Caching -
038 * Connections
039 *
040 * @author creatorfromhell
041 * @since 0.1.2.0
042 */
043public class StorageManager {
044
045  private static StorageManager instance;
046  private final StorageSettings settings;
047  private final TNEJedisManager jedisManager;
048  private StorageProvider provider;
049
050
051  public StorageManager(final String engine, final StorageProvider provider,
052                        final StorageSettings settings, final JedisPool pool) {
053
054    instance = this;
055    this.settings = settings;
056
057    if(pool == null || settings.proxyType().equalsIgnoreCase("bungee")) {
058      this.jedisManager = null;
059    } else {
060      this.jedisManager = new TNEJedisManager(pool);
061    }
062
063    this.provider = provider;
064
065    initialize(engine);
066  }
067
068  public static StorageManager instance() {
069
070    return instance;
071  }
072
073  public boolean meetsRequirement() {
074
075    if(this.provider instanceof SQLConnector) {
076      return ((SQLConnector)this.provider.connector()).checkVersion();
077    }
078    return true;
079  }
080
081  public void initialize(final String engine) {
082
083    //Initialize our connection.
084    this.provider.initialize(engine);
085    this.provider.connector().initialize();
086    this.provider.engine().initialize(this.provider.connector());
087    this.provider.initialize();
088  }
089
090  public void sendProxyMessage(final String channel, final byte[] data) {
091
092    switch(settings.proxyType().toLowerCase()) {
093      case "redis" -> {
094        if(jedisManager != null) {
095          jedisManager.publish(channel, data);
096        }
097      }
098      default -> PluginCore.server().proxy().send(channel, data);
099    }
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Used to load this object.
104   *
105   * @param object     The class of the object to be loaded.
106   * @param identifier The identifier used to identify the object to load.
107   *
108   * @return The object to load.
109   */
110  public <T> Optional<T> load(Class<? extends T> object, @NotNull final String identifier) {
111
112    final Datable<T> data = (Datable<T>)provider.engine().datables().get(object);
113    if(data != null) {
114      return data.load(provider.connector(), identifier);
115    }
116    return Optional.empty();
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Used to load all objects of this type.
121   *
122   * @param object     The class of the object to be loaded.
123   * @param identifier The identifier used to load objects, if they relate to a specific identifier,
124   *                   otherwise this will be null.
125   *
126   * @return A collection containing the objects loaded.
127   */
128  public <T> Collection<T> loadAll(Class<? extends T> object, @Nullable final String identifier) {
129
130    final Datable<T> data = (Datable<T>)provider.engine().datables().get(object);
131    if(data != null) {
132      return data.loadAll(provider.connector(), identifier);
133    }
134    return new ArrayList<>();
135  }
136
137
138  /**
139   * Used to store this object.
140   *
141   * @param object     The object to be stored.
142   * @param identifier An optional identifier for loading this object. Note: some Datables may
143   *                   require this identifier.
144   */
145  public <T> void store(T object, @Nullable String identifier) {
146
147    PluginCore.log().inform("Storing Datable of type: " + object.getClass().getName(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
148    final Datable<T> data = (Datable<T>)provider.engine().datables().get(object.getClass());
149    if(data != null) {
150      PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->data.store(provider.connector(), object, identifier),
151                                                        new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
152    }
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * Used to store all data for an identifier in TNE. This method is not switched over to a
157   * secondary thread automatically. Please make sure to use wisely.
158   */
159  public void storeAll(@NotNull final String identifier) {
160
161    provider.storeAll(identifier);
162  }
163
164  /**
165   * Used to store all data in TNE.
166   */
167  public void storeAll() {
168
169    provider.storeAll();
170  }
171
172  /**
173   * Used to purge TNE data.
174   */
175  public void purge() {
176
177    for(Datable<?> data : provider.engine().datables().values()) {
178      PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->data.purge(provider.connector()), new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
179    }
180
181    provider.purge();
182  }
183
184  /**
185   * Used to reset all data in TNE.
186   */
187  public void reset() {
188    //call the reset method for all modules.
189    PluginCore.loader().getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().reset(this)));
190
191    PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->provider.engine().reset(provider.connector()), new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
192
193    provider.reset();
194  }
195
196  /**
197   * Used to back up data that is currently in the database.
198   *
199   * @return True if the backup was successful, otherwise false.
200   */
201  public boolean backup() {
202    //call the backup method for all modules.
203    PluginCore.loader().getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().backup(this)));
204
205    PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->provider.engine().backup(provider.connector()), new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
206
207    provider.backup();
208    return true;
209  }
210
211  public StorageEngine getEngine() {
212
213    return provider.engine();
214  }
215
216  public StorageConnector<?> getConnector() {
217
218    return provider.connector();
219  }
220
221  public StorageSettings settings() {
222
223    return settings;
224  }
225}
